import React from "react"; import { useState } from "react"; import "./assets/ex_libs/bootstrap_4/bootstrap.css"; import "./assets/css/style.css"; function Quiz() { const [currentQuestionIndex, updateQnIndex] = useState(0); let changeQuestionIndex = (changed) => { if (currentQuestionIndex+1 === data.length || (currentQuestionIndex === 0 && changed <= 0)) { // If (maximum question or (first question and the wanted change amount is 1 or more)) then return updateQnIndex(currentQuestionIndex) // Update currentQuestionIndex to currentQuestionIndex } else { return updateQnIndex(currentQuestionIndex+changed) // Update currentQuestionIndex to currentQuestionIndex + changed (changed = {x: x ∈ ℤ}) } } const data = [ { "question": "Do you prefer to spend time with Animals or Humans?", "optn1": "Humans", "optn2": "Animals", "affected": "prefBeings", "optn1Result": "humans", "optn2Result": "animals" }, { "question": "Do you prefer to spend time with Animals or Humans?", "optn1": "Humans", "optn2": "Animals", "affected": "prefBeings", "optn1Result": "humans", "optn2Result": "animals" } ] return (

); } export default Quiz;
